# Project 3

The goal of project 3 is to find key skills for data scientists and put these into a relational database as well as perform some baisic data analysis.

### Loading Libraries.

```{r}
library(RCurl)
library(XML)
library(rvest)

```

Reading the webpage.
```{r}


url <- "https://www.indeed.com/q-data-science-l-New-York-jobs.html"
ineeedPage <- read_html(url)

ExperienceList <- ineeedPage %>%
  html_nodes(".experienceList") %>%
  html_text()


TitleName <- ineeedPage %>%
  html_nodes(".jobtitle") %>%
  html_text()


CompanyName <- ineeedPage %>%
  html_nodes(".company") %>%
  html_text()


df <- data.frame(ExperienceList, TitleName, CompanyName)
kable(df)
```
